Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' among all variants that reach 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' is immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants that originate after a rejection by PRE_APPROVER (e.g., following 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER -> Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE -> Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that occur in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to variants that skip it (e.g., going directly from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events that are preceded by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' cases that eventually lead to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' is followed by a rejection (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' executions that belong to cases that previously experienced a 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of successful paths (ending in 'Payment Handled') that include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' versus those that do not
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that complete within the typical reimbursement timeline (inferred from process efficiency in variants)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events grouped by 'case:BudgetNumber'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Fraction of variants with 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that later include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' after resubmission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurrences that are part of a variant without any rejection activity (e.g., no 'Declaration REJECTED by ...')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in 2018 compared to 2017 (inferred from case identifiers or timestamps if available)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' relative to the total number of approval activities ('Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that occur in the first attempt of submission (i.e., without any prior rejection in the case)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases
